node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Sand Stripper 10 Paddle Tires
node.sales_desc:
The GMZ Sand Stripper 10 Paddle tire is engineered with Deep Cut Paddle (DCP) technology that is designed for naturally aspirated machines. The ten huge Deep Cut Paddles (DCP) deliver extreme acceleration with a XL paddle depth of 22.2mm (0.875).

Other Features:
- Extra wide footprint provides maximum flotation and smooth dune transitions
- Tough 6 ply bias construction delivers long lasting durability and prevents punctures
- Thick Rim Guard Material (RGM) keeps sand out of the bead while protecting wheel lip
- Pair with Sand Stripper front tire for precision steering and stability"

node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Sand Stripper Original Tires
node.sales_desc:
The GMZ Sand Stripper Original Tire features precision engineered Concaved Tread Ribs (CTR) that provide super responsive steering input. These tires allow you to carve the tightest turns and eliminate front-end drift with larger Concaved Tread Ribs (CTR), while having an extra wide footprint that provides maximum flotation and smooth dune transitions.Other Features:

- Tough 6 ply bias construction delivers long lasting durability and prevents punctures
- Thick Rim Guard Material (RGM) keeps sand out of the bead while protecting wheel lip
- Pair with Sand Stripper rear tire for ultimate acceleration

node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Sand Stripper Staggered Tires
node.sales_desc:
The Sand Stripper Staggered tire has proprietary Staggered Cut Paddle (SCP) that is designed for smaller performance machines. 14 alternating Staggered Cut Paddles (SCP) delivers maximum acceleration. Paddle depth of 19mm (0.75 inches).

Other Features:
- Extra wide footprint provides maximum flotation and smooth dune transitions
- Tough 6 ply bias construction delivers long lasting durability and prevents punctures
- Thick Rim Guard Material (RGM) keeps sand out of the bead while protecting wheel lip
- Pair with Sand Stripper front tire for precision steering and stability

node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Sand Stripper Paddle Tires
node.sales_desc:
The Sand Stripper 14 Paddle Tires are engineered with Deep Cut Paddle (DCP) technology that is designed for modern performance machines. The fourteen huge Deep Cut Paddles (DCP) deliver extreme acceleration. HP paddle depth 28.5mm (1.125 inches). XL paddle depth 22.2mm (0.875 inches).

Other Features:
- Extra wide footprint provides maximum flotation and smooth dune transitions
- Tough 6 ply bias construction delivers long lasting durability and prevents punctures
- Thick Rim Guard Material (RGM) keeps sand out of the bead while protecting wheel lip
- Pair with Sand Stripper front tire for precision steering and stability

node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Sand Stripper 16 Paddle Tires
node.sales_desc:
The GMZ Sand Stripper 16 Paddle is engineered with Deep Cut Paddle (DCP) technology that is designed for modern performance machines. The sixteen broad Deep Cut Paddles (DCP) deliver balanced acceleration with a paddle depth of 22.2mm (0.875).

Other Features:
- Extra wide footprint provides maximum flotation and smooth dune transitions
- Tough 6 ply bias construction delivers long lasting durability and prevents punctures
- Thick Rim Guard Material (RGM) keeps sand out of the bead while protecting wheel lip"

node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Sand Stripper TT Tires
node.sales_desc:
The GMZ Sand Stripper TT Tire has Lateral Traction Blocks (LTB) to maximize AWD power to climb the steepest hills faster. This tire also has precision engineered Concaved Tread Ribs (CTR) that provide super responsive steering input that allows you to carve the tightest turns and eliminate front end drift with larger Concaved Tread Ribs (CTR).

Other Features
- Lightweight 4 ply bias construction reduces rotating mass for maximum power delivery
- Thick Rim Guard Material (RGM) keeps sand out of the bead while protecting wheel lip
- Pair with Sand Stripper rear tire for ultimate acceleration

The Sportech XC (Cross-Country) ATV tires are designed for current off-road sport ATVs where reliability and performance are paramount. These tires are built with an ultra-tough 6-ply construction and are lighter than most XC tires. The specially engineered sidewall and angled side knob construction provides great stability and controllable side bite.

node.display_name: GMZ Race Products Ivan Stewart Ironman Edition Tires
node.sales_desc:
The Ivan Stewart Ironman Edition features Lug Freeing Sipes (LFS) which has parallel grooves allows for individual lug segment movement over uneven terrain for a more planted feel. This tire also has upper sidewall Progressive Traction Blocks (PTB) designed for forward bite in deep two-track and silt.

Other Features:
- Proprietary tread pattern developed for maximum traction and predictable lateral stability
- Medium single durometer compound formulated for high-performance machines
- Flat contact patch delivers more forward grip and even tread wear
- Extra tough 8 ply bias construction provide long lasting durability and prevents punctures

The Cutthroat Tire is a great DOT approved all-terrain tire with off road Race Truck inspired tread design. Featuring a 6 Ply construction designed with a tighter tread pattern which helps prevent punctures in between the tread in extremely harsh environments. The Cutthroat Tire is constructed with a heavy-duty sidewall that features a 3/4 tall tread height. The special mix of compounds and tread design offer a soft enough tire for racing which makes for a great recreational tire with long tread life as well."

node.long_desc: Weighs 10% more than the previous one;Provides years of trouble free use;All aluminum construction, no plastic, no brazing, and all welded;Comes with lower drain petcock;Dense Fins make for great cooling
node.sales_desc:
If you need a replacement radiator do not be fooled by the thin poorly made radiators on the market. We know because we used to sell them too....

We had so many issues we started from scratch, we redesigning this one with thicker aluminum and had it fully welded on the outside, not the inside so you can see the welds and the quality of those welds. This also comes with a radiator cap and pressed in nuts for your shroud or our electric fan mount.

node.sales_desc: Add some much-needed protection to your vehicle with Low Range Off-Road's Defiant Armor Series Rock Sliders. Rocker panels are exposed and vulnerable to damage by rocks when on the trail. Often even a small amount of damage to rocker panels will keep your doors from opening and closing smoothly. Keep your vehicle protected while looking sharp with the most innovative rocker guards on the market. Sliders are available with no step, tube step, or a formed step.

node.long_desc: Front spacers are clear anodized;Solid CNC machined 6061-T6 aluminum spacers;High grade rear polyurethane spacers;Differential drop;Skidplate drop spacers and longer factory style bolts;Bumpstop spacers;Allows for up to a 33 tire with the factory wheels"
node.sales_desc: Unlike other lifts available on the market that make you disassemble the strut assembly for installation, this lift kit is designed to fit on top of the strut. Why do we do it this way? Because the other lifts can pre-load the spring, making your ride harsher- and they are more difficult to install. Many people who have installed the in-the-strut poly spacers in the past have come to us and asked us why their poly spacers are squeezing out of the strut assembly...its because other lifts aren't designed to take that kind of abuse. You may ask, why don't we make the spacers out of steel like all other leveling kits on the market? We have found that over time, the other steel" sandwiched/ welded spacers will flex and the steel will rust, and the tolerances on the holes and components are not as tight as we would like. Over time, the other lifts would "pop" meaning the struts begin to move on the spacers. Aluminum used as a strut spacer has proven to be the best material, because it will not rust and has the best characteristics for a spacer of this size. We have done our homework here and come up with an easy to install lift (in 2-3 hrs), with more engineering and components than other lifts have."

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Differential Drop Kits
node.long_desc: Includes 2 grade 8 diff drop bolts for ultimate strength;2 grade 8 hardened washers;2 serrated flange nuts for easy installation (factory is flanged);2 Precision CNC-machined differential drop spacers (correct length);4 Precision CNC-machined skid plate drop spacers;4 Flanged 12MM Head Class 10.9 extended skid plate drop bolts
node.sales_desc:
Low Range Off-Road has designed a differential drop to keep your CV joint boots from tearing. Their kit also prevents the premature CV joint wear normally caused by the increased angle.

The differential mounting points come with large factory washers. Depending on the size of spacer used, those factory washers may end up coming into contact with the bushing mount on the differential. This metal to metal contact will result in the kinds of noise nobody wants to endure. Low Range's kit is precision-engineered - no noises, no squeaks, no problems.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Differential Crush Sleeves
node.long_desc: OEM-style crush sleeves
node.sales_desc: If you're looking for a factory-style crush sleeve and not a solid pinion spacer, Low Range's crush sleeves are the ones for you. These are high-quality, OEM-style crush sleeves.

node.long_desc: OEM component;Sold individually
node.sales_desc: Worn out bearings? When swapping to disk brakes, HD axles, a new housing, or just general repair, axle bearings should be checked. When the seal is bad, the bearings should be checked. If the seal is leaking it may be time to replace the bearings as well.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Rag Joint Eliminator
node.long_desc: Mounting hardware included;Sold individually
node.sales_desc: Sick of your rag joint tearing on the trail? Don't just replace it again and again. Use Low Range's heavy-duty rag joint eliminator. Also works well when doing the common sidekick power steering swap with kits that don't already come with one.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Transfer Case Cradle
node.long_desc: 17 points of contact to the transfer case;Compatible with Low Range's Samurai transfer case e-brake (SB-EBK-LR);A lower skid plate to protect the transfer case from trail abrasion;All necessary hardware included- even the necessary drill bits;CNC laser cut, CNC press bent, hand MIG welded;Zinc plated for corrosion resistance;May not work with all exhaust systems;Includes backbone, long and short arm, skid plate, factory transfer case rubber mount, drill bits plus all mounting hardware
node.sales_desc: Low Range's efforts were motivated by repeated transfer case breakage after installing low range t-case gears. The factory brackets are made of thin sheet metal with only 4 points of contact on each side of the case. High torque situations or simply letting out the clutch too fast in low range can cause the mounts to bend, which in turn causes pulling or breaking of the soft aluminum transfer case. In addition, the factory brackets attach to the frame itself in only 3 places creating additional vulnerability. Other aftermarket cradles do not address the transfer case's rigidity problems and use only factory mounting locations to attach their cradle to the case.

node.long_desc: 3/16 thick steel;Made to fit Samurai axles;Weld-on kit;Sold individually"
node.sales_desc: Low Range's Differential Guards are not your ordinary pipe cap. These are laser-cut and formed in-house from 3/16 thick steel. The open lower corners allow for easy cleaning of packed mud as well as easy installation and removal of the fill plug. While other diff guards on the market are made too tall causing interference with steering systems, theirs is precision-engineered for the perfect fit."

node.long_desc: Fits soft top or hardtop models;3003 aluminum diamond tread plate;Includes zinc plated screws and rubber expanding rivet nuts
node.sales_desc: More of a shiny metal person? Some of us are. Go with the Diamond Plate Panels. They are also a great way to dress things up. These panels are laser cut from sheets of 3003 Aluminum Diamond Tread Plate, and they come with all needed hardware for an easy install. These panels are designed to be attached with rubber expanding rivet nuts to keep the panels tight and prevent annoying vibration and rattles.

node.long_desc: Fits soft top models;Laser-cut 5052 aluminum or diamond plate;Includes zinc plated screws and rubber expanding rivet nuts
node.sales_desc: The OEM interior panels don't hold up well to the ravages of weathering and off-roading. These aluminum interior panels are a durable and economical replacement for your cracked or rotted interior panels. Our laser-cut 5052 aluminum panels look great as-is or can be painted with your favorite color. These panels are provided with zinc plated screws and rubber expanding rivet nuts to keep the panels secured tightly, and to prevent annoying vibration and rattling.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Air Intake Scoop
node.long_desc: Made from CNC laser cut steel;CNC press bent for accuracy;Bare metal finish - Can be painted to match your body;Shown painted in images for illustration;Comes with 4 self drilling screws;Designed for no hood interference;Matches the Samurai body lines nicely
node.sales_desc: If you have an issue with large leaves and debris dropping into your air intake- you are not alone. This scoop not only adds an attractive look to your vehicle but it solves a very common problem. It also puts more air through your vents which helps provide more ventilation, keep you cooler and or warmer!

node.long_desc: Fits soft top models;3003 aluminum diamond tread plate;Includes zinc plated screws and rubber expanding rivet nuts
node.sales_desc: More of a shiny metal person? Some of us are. Go with the Diamond Plate Panels. They are also a great way to dress things up. These panels are laser cut from sheets of 3003 Aluminum Diamond Tread Plate, and they come with all needed hardware for an easy install. These panels are designed to be attached with rubber expanding rivet nuts to keep the panels tight and prevent annoying vibration and rattles.

node.long_desc: 6061-T6 billet aluminum;Sold as a pair;1 degree taper
node.sales_desc:
Low Range Offroad's blocks are CNC cut and machined from solid 6061-T6 billet aluminum, with a CNC machined pressed in steel locating stud. By their machining and press technique, they achieve what cannot be matched in todays market- ACCURACY.

This 1 degree taper is machined in the block with a CNC Machined F" indicating which way the block is installed in the vehicle. Why a taper? They have found that with a 1 degree taper we achieve the least drive train vibration. They have worked closely with dealerships to make sure the best possible product is installed on customer vehicles.

These blocks provide 1" of rear lift when used with a 3" front leveling spacer. When the front is lifted more than the rear weight shifts back a bit more on the rear springs. In order to get 1" of lift their blocks are slightly taller than 1". When used without a front lift their blocks give 1.25" of rear lift."

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Leaf Spring Bolt Kit
node.long_desc: For aftermarket shackles and bushings;Includes: (quantity 1) 1/2-20 x 4 grade 8 bolt, (quantity 2) 1/2-20 SAE grade 8 thru hard washers and (quantity 1) 1/2-20 grade 5 nyloc nut;For a whole Samurai you will need 12 bolt kits
node.sales_desc:
The factory spring bolt on a Samurai is 12mm (.472 inch). All Aftermarket Shackles are 1/2 holes (.500 inch).

These are the bolts used with aftermarket shackles with Energy Suspension Bushings for Aftermarket Shackles.

NOTE: On the Samurai for the fixed mount (non shackle end) you will need to drill out to 1/2" with these bolts when used with aftermarket shackle bushings.

For a whole Samurai you will need 12 bolt kits. If you have purchased aftermarket shackles, you will only need 4 bolt kits to be used on the fixed spring end."

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Longfield Axle Shafts
node.long_desc: 33 spline;4340 chromoly steel;Longfield birfields are made out of 100% chromoly;Dual heat-treated for superior strength;Larger diameter than stock;Upgraded to 26-splines on the differential side
node.sales_desc: The Longfield Samurai 33-Spline Front Axle shafts are made out of 4340 chromoly steel. The Longfield birfields are made out of 100% chromoly and are precision polished to remove any imperfections that may cause stress risers. The internals of the Longfield birfields are made out of 4340 chromoly steel and then dual heat-treated for superior strength. The axle shafts are also made out of 4340 chromoly steel. The shafts have a larger diameter than stock and are upgraded to 26-splines on the differential side. The Birfield side of the axle shaft and the inner race of the Birfield have been upgraded to 33-splines to better distribute the torque loading.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad King Pin Bearings
node.long_desc: 12 needle bearings in the cage;Sold Individually
node.sales_desc: When it comes to rebuilding front axles, some people insist on using only Japanese components. Always looking to give customers what they want, Low Range offers these bearings made by Koyo, NSK, NTN or Nachi. With 12 needle bearings in the cage distributing stress across 12 points of contact, these are a cut above others that may have fewer, larger needles. Larger needles in a cage doesn't necessarily mean it takes a higher stress load.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Toyota Ultimate Backing Plate Eliminator
node.long_desc: Sold as a pair;Eliminates your factory flimsy Toyota Backing plate that can attract mud and rocks;Inadequately vent rotors;Uses either factory or aftermarket spindle bolts/studs;Uses OEM brake hard lines
node.sales_desc: Toyota solid axle backing plates (sometimes called dust shields) seem to become damaged with even the slightest touch, but removing them leaves your brake hard lines unsecured. On the other hand, traditional backing plate eliminators have no provision for keeping your brake hard lines in place to prevent damage. The solution is the Toyota Ultimate Backing Plate Eliminator which not only eliminates the backing plate but also includes an integrated brake line holder.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Clutch Kit and Plates
node.long_desc: Made in USA ceramic material;Up to 53% higher than imported materials and up to 130% longer life;6 spring retainer assembly with severe duty retainer rivets;12 high-coefficient of friction ceramic pads for fast engagement and the extreme duty friction needed;Clutch pressure plate key features made in Japan by an OE manufacturer;Will not wear your foot out due to over sprung pressure plates;DST (Diaphram Spring Type), which is much better than other aftermarket clutch covers;Delivered unpainted to prevent heat caused by heavy usage from releasing unwanted fumes and odors into the cab
node.sales_desc: Stock or typical aftermarket Suzuki Samurai clutches are fine for normal, lighter-duty usage, but wear and performance can be significantly impacted by more extreme conditions. In such cases, a ceramic clutch is a great upgrade. Ceramic has properties that surpass the performance of woven glass or organic materials. Not only does ceramic last longer, but its performance doesn't degrade as it wears. In addition, ceramic delivers the same level of performance whether hot or cold. This kit offers a much higher coefficient of friction than your factory clutch and increased friction equals more power to the wheels.

node.long_desc: Laser cut from 1/4 steel;Fully zinc plated to prevent rust;Bracket may need clearenced to fit some GM alternators"
node.sales_desc: Looking to run bigger lights, a winch, or even just a better stereo system but still running with that tiny stock alternator? Upgrade to a common larger alternator. We have the brackets needed to achieve this.

Designed to provide non-critical triage medical support;Contains supplies to treat the most common injuries;Weighing just one pound and compact enough to fit virtually anywhere;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The TeraFlex trail series medical kit is designed to provide non-critical triage medical support during remote off road trail trips. This kit contains supplies to treat the most common injuries, including small wounds, stabilizing sprains, and stopping bleeding. Weighing just one pound and compact enough to fit virtually anywhere in the vehicle, the TeraFlex medical kit is required equipment on your next off road adventure.
Includes an assortment of adhesive bandages, gauze pads, moleskin, antiseptic swab pads, nitrile gloves, cloth tape, aspirin, ibuprofen, acetaminophen, and the book Wilderness & Travel Medicine by Eric A. Weiss, M.D.

The outer triple O ring tube seal presses into the housing and provides a positive mud and water barrier;The inner double axle seal surface is designed with a cavity between the seal surfaces to form a grease filled pocket providing lubrication for the seals and provides another barrier to mud and grime;These are the same seals that were developed, proven and currently used in many NASCAR applications;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex high performance front axle tube seal is designed exclusively for the oversized 3.25 O.D. axle tubes found on Tera30 and Tera44 JK replacement housings. The outer triple O ring tube seal presses into the housing and provides a positive mud and water barrier. The inner double axle seal surface is designed with a cavity between the seal surfaces to form a grease filled pocket providing lubrication for the seals and provides another barrier to mud and grime. These are the same seals that were developed, proven and currently used in many NASCAR applications. The axle tube seal is fully compatible with all available Rubicon and non-Rubicon axle shafts, including 27 spline Dana 30 up to aftermarket 1.5" 35 spline Dana 44 shafts. The billet 6061-T6 aluminum seal housing is laser etched with graphics and black hard anodized for superior corrosion resistance. Fits Tera30 and Tera44 axles. Specify axle tube thickness."

node.long_desc: Sleek low profile design for unobtrusive aesthetics and clean aerodynamics for a quiet ride;Composite supports and trim parts are molded to match the subtle curvature of the hard top;Extruded aluminum construction for reduced weight;Extra thick architectural grade UV resistant hard anodizing;Fasteners coated to OEM specifications for superior corrosion/rust resistance;Rack cargo load is fully supported by factory sport bar;Unique easy to reach access holes allow for quick hard top removal with only 4 additional mounting fasteners to loosen;4 T-slot channels on main rail for a variety of mounting points;Optional Slat kit sold separately for additional mounting options;Molded in hooks on slat mounts to secure light loads;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The TeraFlex JK Nebo roof rack incorporates OEM aesthetics and styling with rugged performance in a purpose-built configuration that will give you the capacity to extend your adventure even further. Feel at home in the city or fully loaded on the Rubicon with its factory finished appearance. The low profile streamlined design is intentionally unobtrusive when unloaded to reduce air resistance and noise.
Universal accessory mounting compatibility was one of the major objectives with this rack. This cargo slat kit provides a platform to hold gear and will also allow direct mounting of popular sport equipment carriers without requiring the use of a load or cross bar. This cargo slat kit must be used with the Nebo roof rack main rain kit.

node.sales_desc: American Trail Products exhaust spacer kit for all 2012-UP JK Wranglers that have a lift kit with 2.0 or higher lift. These exhaust down pipe spacers are installed between the driver and passenger head pipe flanges and the flanges of the cross pipe. This moves the exhaust cross pipe down and back to provide clearance with the cross-member. This prevents contact between the front driveshaft and the exhaust cross pipe during suspension down travel."

node.sales_desc: American Trail Products introduces a new line of Aluminum Hawse Fairleads. Our Double Radius Fairlead is designed to aid in pulling control and Synthetic rope longevity at harsh angles in all directions. Our aluminum Fairlead has a larger outer double radius for the synthetic rope to slide against.This results in less stress on the rope fibers, increasing the longevity of your synthetic rope. It's a sleek designed, manufactured completely for function but will compliment any 4x4 vehicle with its style.Our aluminum fairleads are proudly made right here in the U.S.A. These fairleads come in a durable MIL-Spec TYPE III gun metal gray or black hard anodized finish with a laser engraved ATP logo.

node.long_desc: Hood decal
node.sales_desc:
At American Trail Products we are driven to build products that fuel enthusiasm in our community. ATP products offer a unique approach in design and function that will set your Jeep apart, both in functionality and style.

American Trail Products is committed to engineering, testing and manufacturing innovative, superior products while maintaining a cutting edge and functional style for the Jeep community. Our team is dedicated to supporting everyone we come in contact with by offering the best customer experience and product possible.

node.display_name: Method Race Wheels UTV Series 409 Bead Grip - Black
node.sales_desc:
The Method Race Wheels 409 UTV Bead Grip wheel has Method's patented Bead Grip technology which engages the tire bead for increased grip at low air pressures. The wheel also has an aggressive safety hump on bead seats to further prevent de-beading while being constructed with one-pieced 356 aluminum construction with T6 heat treatment.

Method Race Wheels was created to give to the off road racing community a wheel company that makes wheels specifically for their sport. Every wheel is engineered and designed for it's intended use, having been thru numerous Finite Element Analysis and field tests. Method Race Wheels have been developed to minimize weight and increase strength. The result is a wheel that is Lighter. Stronger. Faster.

node.display_name: Black Rhino York Matte Gunmetal Wheels
node.sales_desc: York is a one of a kind six spoke new from Black Rhino. It's utilizing a fresh new style that shows a performance oriented nature, combined with an undeniable tough precision constructed look that shows both rugged character with sporty style. Six rubbed spokes create raised triangles that point towards the center combined with its outer lip gives the York a unique hybrid personality of speed and toughness. The cut-through lip pattern adds a nice texture reminiscent of the hollowed out features common in race bred machines. To cover the full range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, York off road rims are available in 17X8, 17x9, 18X8, 18x9, and 20x9 sizes. Offsets range from -12mm to+52mm for five and six lug bolt patterns. York truck wheels are featured in two finishes that show the wheel off, including a stealthy matte black and a sporty matte gunmetal.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Zion Matte Black with Machined Face/Dark Matte Tint Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Zion is a sports wheel made to give on road SUV's and Trucks the ultimate edge of performance and style. Zion wheels are engineered to meet and exceed OEM standards featuring true hub-centric design for smooth vibration free ride and are casted with consistent radial runout tolerance that is nearly the industry standards. Zion is made available in both 5 and 6 lug PCD formats featuring a complimentary 5 spoke or 6 spoke design. Each spoke projects outward from the PCD hole splitting through a webbed surface until it meets the thin precision cut face creating a visually light wheel optimizing strength and rigidity. Zion aftermarket rim is available in Gloss Black and Matte Black with Machined Dark Matte Tint Face.

node.sales_desc:
Whether you use your ATV / UTV on the dirt, in the sand, through the snow, or over the mud, Black Rhino now offers a lineup of UTV wheels to suit your needs. It's a beefy, take-no-prisoners design, entirely in keeping with the spirit of stock and lifted trucks prepped for off highway gambols. Warload off-road wheels are aggressively sized, too, from 17x8, 17x9, 18x8, 18x9, 20x9 and up to 22x10, all with oversized lips to provide a sturdy bead seat for the big fat tires offroaders prefer. Warlord truck wheels are available in 5, 6 and 8-lug bolt patterns, including5x110, 5x114, 6x120, 5x120 for the VW Amarok and the newer 6x130 pattern for Chevy Colorado, GMC Canyon and 8x180 for bigger GMC trucks. Offsets range from -23mm to +12mm. Versions are also available for Sprinter vans and CUVs. Warlord wheels are available in a striking matte gunmetal finish and in matte black with a machined dark-tint lip. Like all Black Rhino wheels, Warlord off-road rims are engineered for strength, durability and long-lasting good looks.

ARB brings you the premium turn-key solution designed for remote travel and challenging routes, making unique, off-the-grid experiences possible. The Overland package offers you the opportunity to fully outfit your Jeep Wrangler JL with an integrated off-road solution for your next adventure, all with one part number.

The Overland Package is ARB's premium package designed to outfit your JL with everything you need to be adventure-ready includin protection equipment, suspension, storage solutions, lighting, and much more. The Crawler Package is a one-stop-shop solution to transform the Jeep Wrangler JL into an unstoppable and well-protected rock-crawling machine.

This package includes all the equipment you need to build a reliable and endless supply of air, improve ride quality, maintain 100% traction, and provide protection from all angles through an integrated package. The ARB Wheeler Package represents the next generation of aftermarket support for the modern Jeep builder.

This solution incorporates the necessary protection equipment to keep you and your vehicle unstoppable. It also provides top-of-the-line suspension to optimize your ride quality on- or off-road.

Your off-road vehicle should be more than the sum of its parts. Don't settle for pieces. Buy the ARB 4x4 Accessories solution.

TeraFlex Alpine CT (Cross-Trail) Suspension Systems begin where our Sport S/T (Street/Trail) Suspension Systems end.

The granddaddy of all our kits, the TeraFlex Alpine CT6 Suspension System is engineered to excel whether driving on road or on the trail, through the desert, or rock crawling! The 6 lift Alpine CT6 builds on the 4" lift Alpine CT4 by adding a heavy-duty drag link flip kit and heavy-duty frame brace kit to correct steering geometry, eliminate front end shimmy, and reinforce the frame.

Our fully adjustable Alpine flexarms have been engineered to allow tuning of the pinion and caster angles, anti-squat geometry, and tire position as well as optimize front and rear roll centers. The heavy-duty adjustable front track bar and rear track bar bracket eliminate side-to-side movement. Alpine flexarms feature dependable and maintenance-free bushings. The gusseted and reinforced bracketry reduces noise, vibration, and harshness (NVH) compared to other longarm kits.

All of this adds up to provide full suspension articulation and flex off-road along with superior ride quality and performance on road as well as minimal brake dive and squat under acceleration to better put the power down on any surface."

The new relocation brackets ensure the rear lift coil springs (not included) remain vertical to prevent spring bowing. Although it's been designed for aftermarket "high-line" fenders, this kit will still work with the factory fender flares."

Rough Country Black Series Cree LED Light Bars

Fastway Flash Integrated Scale Adjustable Ball Mounts
node.long_desc: 1,000 lb max tongue weight;10,000 lb max trailer weight;Made to fit your 2 receiver;2" & 2-5/16" chrome hitch balls;Mechanical tongue scale built into the ball mount;Enjoy improved steering, better braking control and reduced trailer sway;Easy height and ball adjustments;Aircraft-grade aluminum for unmatched strength and durability"
node.sales_desc:
The Flash Integrated Scale Ball Mount features a mechanical tongue scale built into the ball mount that measures the tongue weight of your trailer load, providing safer, more confident towing.

Towing a trailer with too light or too heavy of a tongue weight can be dangerous and result in an accident. Light tongue weight can cause the trailer to suddenly sway violently and cause a loss of control. Heavy tongue weight can cause unnecessary squat in the rear of the tow vehicle and raise the front of the tow vehicle up or cause tire failure. These can result in loss of tow vehicle steering and breaking capabilities and can cause a loss of control and accidents.

When loading a trailer, the tongue weight should be 10-15% of the total trailer weight. The Flash ISBM makes it easy to know if your trailer is loaded properly by showing how much of the trailer weight is on the tongue. With a properly balanced load, you can enjoy improved steering, better braking control and reduced trailer sway.

Easy height and ball adjustments make it the perfect solution for towing multiple trailers, and the aircraft-grade aluminum gives you unmatched strength and durability. The Flash ISBM easily handles the heaviest of loads, at about half the weight of comparable steel ball mounts. This makes carrying, adjusting, and installing your Flash ISBM easy and comfortable.

node.long_desc: Base Line Performance Series Seat Covers;Headrest covers not included (Tactical Series includes headrest covers);Waterproof fabric with high grade foam;Scrim backing for comfort and to protect your seat underneath;Guaranteed not to fade for 3 years minimum;Proudly made in the U.S.A.
node.sales_desc: Introducing the new Bartact Base Line Performance Seat Covers (Headrest covers sold separately)...Proudly Made in the U.S.A. Bartact now has a more economical version of its seat covers, still retaining all of the quality materials available in the Tactical seat covers, but with a few differences. The Base Line Performance covers are only available in black and graphite. They also do not have the PALS/MOLLE system like Bartact Tactical covers do. The Base Line version is made to be more streamlined and repel water even better than the tactical covers, due to the fact that Bartact eliminated all stitching on the fronts, meaning water can only penetrate the covers at the stitching on the edges. Base Line Series Covers have maintained the snug fitment, since that is one of the most important aspects of a good seat cover. Bartact also kept its 1/4 high grade foam and scrim backing in order to protect your seats underneath. Buying loose seat covers without padding leaves you prone to seat wear from the seat covers sliding around. You don't have to worry about that with any Bartact seat covers."

node.sales_desc: The roots of MasterCraft Safety stretch all the way back to 1970 when the company specialized in aerospace fabrication, manufacturing and welding and today the focus is squarely on seats. This focus began with racing seats with built-in suspension and branched into safety and seat accessories like belts, seat covers and grab handles. Developing graduated foams to better absorb shock that Jeeps undergo off-roading is currently the company's pet project, yet all of their seats incorporate comfort, style and, of course, safety. node.sales_desc: The Pro-Series Stubby Front Winch bumper is loaded with features that make this bumper one of the best on the market. It features an integrated front skid plate that runs down to the crash bar. An aggressive approach angle makes steep climbs easier. It also uses an integrated shorty stinger hoop with gusset support braces. The winch plate is constructed of beefy 1/4 inch steel plate. The massive recovery points are tied directly to the frame. To add a wider profile you can add optional bumper wings (B/AJK-19536-WC for cube lights or B/A19536-WR for 3inch round lights). There is also no need to relocate the vacuum pump on newer models.

node.long_desc: Accel with Quick-Release & D-Ring, Small (2 Restraints);Black; Small; Impact Accel device distributes stress under impact through four paths providing an equal distribution of forces while also offering a full range of head motion;Weighing 1.8 pounds, the Impact Accel features unique body-forming shoulder pads minimizing pressure points on the collarbones and significantly improving comfor;Constructed from lightweight DuPont carbon composite material; Adjustable from 10 degrees 40 degreesAccel D-Rings Mounting Hardware Pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Impact Accel offers unparalleled comfort combined with the ultimate in frontal and angular impact protection. Utilizing a single self-neutralizing tether system, the Impact Accel device distributes stress under impact through four paths providing an equal distribution of forces while also offering a full range of head motion. Weighing just a mere 1.8 pounds, the Impact Accel features unique body-forming shoulder pads minimizing pressure points on the collarbones and significantly improving comfort. Constructed from lightweight yet durable DuPont carbon composite material, the design and choice of materials allows the device to flex in unison with the body thus minimizing driver fatigue and ensuring your device can withstand the rigors of racing. Adjustable from 10 40, the Impact Accel is your go-to safety device regardless of seat angle or complement of motorsports. Priced at $599, the Accel includes all necessary tether hardware, helmet clips and tools, and also arrives in a convenient and durable storage bag. Offered with everything necessary to race safer at an affordable price!Accel Hardware is for use with with the Impact Accel Frontal Head Restraint Devices.

node.long_desc: Compatible with ARB Zero Fridge Freezers;Battery is capable of keeping the fridge cold longer;Light enough to take on any adventure;Integrated high-power rubberised magnets keep the power pack secured to the fridge;Battery level LED display for easy viewing;Simple operation - power it On/Off, that's it;Charges via mains AC power or a suitable inverter/generator (DC charging not available)
node.sales_desc:
Finding that perfect spot to take in the view is what adventure is all about, but then there's the argument whose turn is it to get the next round of drinks from the car or campsite? Now, just bring the fridge with you! The new ARB Portable Power Pack has been specifically designed to keep your ARB Fridge Freezer powered when the vehicle or campsite is out of reach - or even if you're on-the-job at a worksite. Lightweight and packed with a lithium battery punch, the new ARB Portable Power Pack will keep your food and drinks cold no matter where the day takes you.

Aside from the most important job of keeping your food and drinks cold in your fridge while you're out on the trails, the Power Pack has a multitude of additional uses such as: powering the fridge in the family SUV to pick up groceries, hosting a barbecue at the park or the beach, or spending the day out on your boat. It can even serve as a backup for your ARB Fridge when the power goes out at home.

The new ARB Portable Power Pack turns your ARB Fridge Freezer into so much more than just a portable fridge!

node.long_desc: One-of-a-kind functionality truly sets it apart from other truck bed cargo management dividers;Spring-loaded control levers allow truck owners to fine tune divider positioning for custom loads;Lateral tie-offs and bungees can be used to easily secure objects of all shapes and sizes;A flip-up feature lets ladders or lumber be easily loaded under the divider;At only 11 pounds, Cargo Manager can be quickly removed for loading larger items;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Cargo Manager, an optional companion product for Roll-N-Lock tonneau covers, is a movable truck bed divider that can be positioned every 3 along the length of the bed to manage and contain lightweight cargo. Controlled from the driver's side, Cargo Manager is repositioned by simply squeezing the control levers. Cargo Manager's spring-activated mechanism then automatically pins the divider to each side track in the next nearest slot. When combined with a Roll-N-Lock retractable tonneau cover, this dynamic product combination gives truck owners not only the ability to cover and secure the contents of the truck bed, but also prevents objects from shifting in the bed when stopping or turning abruptly.

Our winch plate is constructed from robust 3/16 inch thick steel and engineered for maximum rigidity versus our competitors. Designed using State-of-the-Art 3D modeling with files directly from JEEP, WARN and SUPERWINCH for a precise fit requiring no modification of your jeep to fit most winches. These brackets are hard powder coat black for direct bolt-on installation and a long life. Note: Previous Warn Zeon winches have a 180 deg turning clutch lever which interferes with the bumper but models bought around 3/2018 are shipping with a 90 deg version. Warn has a retrofit 90 degree clutch kit available...just call them. Note: The Jeep JL has very tight tolerances in this area. node.display_name: Bilstein 9300 Black Hawk Series Shock Absorber
node.long_desc: One piece 6061 extruded aluminum body with hard anodized finish;30% faster heat dissipation;10% - 25% lighter than similar welded bypass steel shocks;Up to 100 degrees cooler peak operating temperature;4 1/2 inch diameter aluminum reservoir with anti-cavitation valve (ACV);Bypass tubes allow for position sensitive damping adjustability;Completely owner tunable and rebuildable;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bilstein 9300 Black Hawk shock absorbers are a position sensitive, adjustable bypass shock absorbers designed for off-road motorsports applications. Based on an aluminum extrusion, the hard anodized shock body will dissipate heat 30% faster than a steel body shock absorber. M 9300 Black Hawk shock absorbers use 4 IFMVs (Incremental Bypass Flow Metering Valve), with 10 adjustable positions to perfectly adjust the rebound and compression damping. 9300 Black Hawk shock absorbers utilize a 3 inch ID piston bore and an ACV (Anti-Cavitiation Valve), which is housed in a 4.5 inch OD remote reservoir. The ACV allows the shock absorber to operate with much lower gas pressure to eliminate oil cavitation. With the ACV, 9300 Black Hawk shock absorbers can fully function at 70-90 PSI which improves the overall durability and comfort. These shock absorbers are completely owner rebuildable and revalvable with service parts readily available. 9300 Black Hawk shock absorbers will provide the most advanced technology found in an off-road racing shock absorber today.

node.long_desc: Extreme volume nitrogen bulb;Zinc plated for a durable, long lasting finish;Available with or without base valve;Completely racer rebuildable and revalvable;Accepts threaded coil over sleeve;Available in linear or digressive valvings;Optional adjustable shaft available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bilstein XVS-S Series shock absorbers feature a 46mm piston, steel construction, and a threaded body designed for motorsports applications. These shock absorbers are rebuildable via an integrated Schrader valve. The large volume dual zone nitrogen bulb, with optional base valve, allows for lower gas pressure for increased grip. These shock absorbers are available in non-, single and double adjustable configurations for precise on-vehicle tuning options. XVS-S Series shock absorbers are ideal for racers looking for a steel, rebuildable design with multiple upgrade options and superior performance.

node.long_desc: 36mm, 46mm, monotube and twin tube available options; BILSTEIN?s mono-tube technology is the number-one choice in motorsports and series-production sports cars: no other type gives engineers the same freedom to choose the perfect installation location or position;BILSTEIN?s twin-tube absorbers, featuring OEM quality that has undergone rigorous testing, offer a marked improvement in driving characteristics with universal spare parts replaced in a timely and efficient manner;California Residents: WARNING"

Each damper is rigorously tested for quality that meets or exceeds OE standards. Performance Series dampers will provide improved safety and handling performance with the added benefit of world-famous Bilstein quality.

node.long_desc: Monotube gas pressure construction;Deflective disc valving and dropped solid axle specific mounts;High quality triple-plate chrome finish;Can be mounted in any direction;High performance poly urethane bushings;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bilstein SS4 Series Shock Absorbers are designed specifically with custom street rods in mind using Bilstein's patented gas pressure technology. These 36mm monotube shocks are hand built to insure that top level quality is achieved with every shock that goes out the door. Each shock is tuned digressively using Bilstein's proven deflective disc valving technology and are available in two off the shelf settings as well as a custom setting. The body has a high quality, triple plate chrome finish for easy maintenance and flashy good looks. The internal bore has been hard anodized to minimize wear caused by friction making these shocks extremely durable. The shock comes with dropped solid axle specific mounts (5/8 inch bottom 7/16 inch top) allowing for easy installation. The polyurethane bushing mounts have been impregnated with graphite, virtually eliminating the squeaking commonly associated with polyurethane, and are used top and bottom to promote a long life.

node.long_desc: Made using 18 gauge aluminum;No need to drill holes for installation;Uses automotive YHB double sided tape for installation onto body;Protects against shoe scuffs, road debris and covers the unsightly lower pinch seem;Will not work with the OEM Rubicon rock rails;May require some modification to rocker guards if installing with stock and aftermarket steps/rock sliders;Powder coated textured black;Limited lifetime warranty;Made 100% in USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These rocker guards are designed for those Jeep owners that want some rocker protection, but don't want to drill any holes into the vehicles body. They are made using 18 gauge aluminum and are simply adhered to the vehicles rocker panel using provided double sided tape. The rocker guards serve as a fantastic protector against shoe scuffs, road debris and covers up the ugly pinch seem along the bottom of the body panels. Please note that these rocker guards are designed to work with the Hyline Offroad JK Rock Sliders (P/n's 400.300.100 and 400.300.110). They will however work with other steps and/or rock sliders, but some light modification may have to be done to trim the rocker guards just around the pinch seam mounting brackets. They are NOT for use with OEM Rubicon Rock Rails. The rocker guards already come finished with lightly textured black powder coat. PROUDLY MADE 100% IN USA.

node.display_name: ARB Hydraulic Long Travel Recovery Jack
node.long_desc: Backed by the unique power of hydraulic technoogy;Made from hardy aircraft grade 6061 T6 aluminum;Features an adjustable foot that can be rotated 360 degrees;Smoothly jack the vehicle up at .5in increments with each downward maneuver;Easy-to-access red lowering lever ensures lowering the vehicle is achieved swiftly and safely;Minimum lifting height: 6 inches;Maximum lifting height: 28-48 inches;Maximum capacity: 4,409 lbs.;Compressed height: 35 inches;Extended height: 56 inches;When under load, an internal blow-off valve provides overload protection;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: There's little doubt that the traditional farm jack is a handy piece of equipment to have when you're driving off road. You can use it to move your vehicle out of awkward situations, lifting vehicles to fill in voids beneath the tires or even as a bead breaker when you have to make a tire repair. But, as we all know, farm jacks can be dangerous. They're inherently unstable and there are countless YouTube videos of users getting injured from a rogue handle or getting their hands caught between the handle and the body of the jack. With this problem in mind, ARB's team of engineers was determined to come up with a better solution to the unsafe farm jack problem. The focus was to design a safer and easier mechanical jack while being lighter and more compact. Adding a new dimension to traditional techniques, the long-travel ARB JACK is backed by the unique power of hydraulic technology. Kicking into action when even the lightest force is applied to the handle, the hydraulics will smoothly jack the vehicle up at .5in increments with each downward maneuver. While in action, a black rubber body bumper shields the vehicle from risk of damage during the recovery. The easy-to-access red lowering lever ensures lowering the vehicle is achieved swiftly and safely thanks to the two-stage descent feature and safety stop. With the press of a lever, the user is able to adjust the lower speed between a slow or rapid descent.

node.sales_desc: Hyline's Canyon series stubby rear bumper is designed with the minimalist in mind that doesn't want to settle for the common bland styling of most stubby rear bumpers. This is an extremely compact design that hugs the rear frame crossmember tightly but does NOT require any frame cutting. It doesn't just look great; it's functional, easy to install and tough as nails. It's fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand metal finished. The D-Ring mounts are 5/8" thick plate and are welded solid front and back so they can be used as recovery points. Our bumper allows you to use the factory or aftermarket hitch receiver, which could also be used as a center recovery point. All bumpers receive a thorough acid rinse, zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, then are E-Coated and Powder Coated with light black texture. The textured powder coat matches the texture on the stock black fender flares almost perfectly. Completely Bolt on, No Drilling Necessary. PROUDLY MADE 100% In USA."

node.display_name: Black Rhino Armory Matte Gun Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Armory is the brutal weapon of choice when your vehicle must absolutely be victorious in the next dangerous off road operation. Straight from a battlezone, this wheel is the right weapon of choice with its bolted face - a dramatic statement of power that is perfect for the regiment of adventure minded tuners. Black Rhino set their sights to offer one of the most unique off road wheels, down to its unique center cap. This tactical style affirmatively radars an indestructible quality of explosive-proof looks to a whole new caliber. The mission was to cover the best range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Armory off road rims are available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5 and 20x12 sizes. Offsets range from -44 to 0mm and 5, 6 and 8-lug bolt patterns, including an 8/180 pattern for newer GMC and Chevrolet trucks. These truck rims sport huge lips to provide safe bead seating for oversized tires.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Attica Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino truck and SUV wheels lineup is built with two types of vehicles in mind: The first set-up was built with a negative offset that works perfectly with your Truck or SUV with that Extreme lift. This provides your Off Road Beast with an aggressive stance that these vehicles demand. The second is your more street friendly vehicle that you want to give that stylish look to set it apart from all other vehicles. The wheels offset is more positive and will still allow you to use it on your vehicle with a mild lift or stock appearance. The wheels come in a variety of 17, 18", 20" 22" and 24" sizes in a variety of finishes - Gloss Gunmental, Matte Black w/Machine Face & Dark Matte Tint, Matte Black w/Matte Graphite Lip, Matte Black, Gloss Black with Machine, Matte Black with Matte Machine, 5, 6 and 8 Lug, all depending on what perfectly suits your Truck or SUV. So if you have a 12" lift with Dual Shocks or you have that aggressive Street Truck, Black Rhino Off Road Truck wheels and SUV wheels are the ones for you."

node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino truck and SUV wheels lineup is built with two types of vehicles in mind: The first set-up was built with a negative offset that works perfectly with your Truck or SUV with that Extreme lift. This provides your Off-Road Beast with an aggressive stance that these vehicles demand. So if you have a 12" lift with Dual Shocks or you have that aggressive Street Truck, Black Rhino Off Road Truck and SUV wheels are the ones for you."

node.display_name: Black Rhino Barstow Textured Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Barstow delivers a tough no-nonsense type of styling derived from a classic split five spoke design. The aftermarket rim features a deep step lip leading to a thick beadlock style ring that serves a purpose to protect the wheels valve stem. Even more rugged is the newly engineered Textured Rough Matte Black finish made to compliment durable bedliner coatings found on offroaders. Other finishes include a Textured Matte Black or Matte Bronze with Matte Black Lip Ring (etched Black Rhino Spoke Logo) for truck and SUV owners that want a complimenting color scheme. The Barstow is available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, and 20x9.5 in multiple offsets across 5 and 6 lug PCD patterns to accommodate a wide range of vehicles.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Boxer Gun Black Wheels
node.sales_desc:
The Black Rhino Boxer was designed by enthusiast and made for enthusiast of the Ford and Subaru off road rally racing genre. For the offroad overland Subaru vehicles such Crosstrek XV, Legacy, Impreza, Forester, Outback, and WRX, the wheel is offered in 15x7 size weighing in at a mere 16lbs! That means the lightweight wheel weighs approximately 3.4lbs less than competitors resulting in improved performance, steering response, and gas mileage. The aftermarket rim also features a rally ring that serves to protect the valve stem while enhancing strength and prevents deformation of the wheel from outside forces. Other sizes available are 17x8 and 18x8 for vehicles such as, but not limited to BRZ, Fiesta ST, Focus ST, FRS, STI, and WRX. Available finishes include Gloss Gold and Matte Gun Black.

There is nothing quite like the thrill of going off-road. Once your are hooked, enhancing the experience often becomes a priority. For many people, the first step to doing that is beefing up the tires. To accommodate those new rugged beasts, you also need to have the right wheels. 4 Wheel Parts has an array of options from leading manufacturers, including Black Rhino boxer wheels.

Choosing the Right Wheel
Before jumping and making a purchase, it is necessary to make a few considerations. When it comes to the perfect wheel, how you off-road and size are important factors. Although all Black Rhino wheels boxer are durable and able to withstand a beating, rock crawling enthusiasts will want to go with an extra heavy-duty option. Diameter is the next consideration. It is important to be able to clear the axle's braking components, as well as accommodate the size of the tire.

An Array of Competitively Priced Options
When choosing a high-quality Black Rhino boxer, there are many options to choose from. Whether you are just adding a little lift and need a 15-by-7 or going extra big and need 18-by-8, 4 Wheel Parts is here to help you find

node.display_name: Black Rhino Crawler Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Crawler is a street legal version of Black Rhino's popular Crawler Beadlock wheel. It is a timeless solid five spoke style with a bold concave spoke profile constructed into an ultra rugged custom wheel. It's a classic take on the five spoke design that is sure to perfectly complement any rugged style that define this brand and suits the most demanding styles of trucks.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Crawler Matte Bronze with Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Crawler is a street legal version of Black Rhino's popular Crawler Beadlock wheel. It is a timeless solid five spoke style with a bold concave spoke profile constructed into an ultra rugged custom wheel. It's a classic take on the five spoke design that is sure to perfectly complement any rugged style that define this brand and suits the most demanding styles of trucks.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Sierra Gloss Black Milled Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Sierra is a thick & aggressive multi-spoke style wheel. The Sierra takes its name from the vast mountain range spanning the California, and Nevada border. Each spoke on the Sierra emulates the peaks and valleys of the rugged granite mountains. Like its name Sierra; which also translates to saw' in Spanish, each spoke has a tough hard cut milled section that wraps the inner part of each spoke. Available in 17x9,18x9",20x9" & 20x10", with offsets ranging from +12mm, 00mm, -12mm, -25mm. There is a variety of fitments available in 5x127, 5x139.7, 5x150, 6x135, 6x139.7, 8x165, 8x170. The Sierra is available in a Gloss Black w/ Milled Spokes. Each Black Rhino wheel is engineered to carry the heavy loads often associated with Trucks and SUV's. All wheels are either hub-centric or supplied with centering rings to ensure a smooth vibration free ride. Sierra off road wheels by Black Rhino."

node.long_desc: Covers loads of dirt, mulch, rock, and building materials;Provides shade for camping and outdoors;Helps compliance with secure load regulations;Heavy duty grommets for tie down;UV resistant
node.sales_desc:
The Rightline Gear Mesh Tarp is tough enough for any job! Use it to cover loads of dirt, mulch, and building materials. Heavy duty grommets along its edge provide for secure tie down. The tough fabric lets light and air through, making it useful for many specialty applications.

The Tarp fits all truck beds: full size, mid size and compact. It also works great on utility trailers. Mesh Tarps can even be used to provide shade for your campsite and backyard! The tarp is UV resistant and will last for years of continued use!

node.display_name: Rightline Gear Anti-Theft Trailer Coupler Balls
node.long_desc: Fills hitch space in coupler to prevent towing devices from being inserted;Polycarbonate ball cannot be broken or removed once secured with lock;Impossible to misplace when zipped to trailer chain;Lock features branded orange band for increased visibility to deter theft
node.sales_desc:
The Rightline Gear Anti-Theft Trailer Coupler Ball guards against theft when the trailer is off the vehicle. The Trailer Ball guards against trailer tow-away by filling the space where hitch balls or smaller towing devices are inserted. The super strong polycarbonate ball cannot be broken or removed once it is secured in place by a trailer coupler lock.

A handy uv protected zip tie attaches the Trailer Ball to the trailer chain so that the ball is impossible to misplace. The Anti-Theft Trailer Coupler Ball performs better than many trailer security devices that are double or triple the price!

node.long_desc: Quarter-turn anchoring system provides quick installation and removal;Adjustable anchors to eliminate chucking between the legs and under-bed platform;Spherical axial bearing for unimpeded head movement and smooth, quiet towing;Dual jaws provide 360-degree kingpin contact;Three grease fittings for continuous lubrication;Self-aligning head offers a wide opening for easy coupling;Operates using a single, lockable, short-throw handle;Three-position coupling indicator is clearly visible from truck cab;Includes a polyethylene lube plate to eliminate messy grease deposits;Offers three height adjustment positions to adapt to each unique truck bed;Tested for safety in accordance with SAE J2638;Protected by a highly durable carbide black powder coat finish;Limited lifetime warranty (one-year finish, one-year parts)
node.sales_desc:
Wherever you find your open road, you need a 5th wheel hitch that is strong like the Rocky Mountains, smooth like the rolling hills of Iowa and quiet like the South Dakota Badlands. The CURT Q25 5th wheel hitch offers superior towing power and a quiet ride to be the ultimate in RV towing.

The spherical axial bearing of the Q25 is what makes this hitch unique. It offers free, unimpeded movement of the 5th wheel head, allowing it to tilt in any direction. Once coupled to the kingpin, the head pivots and angles with your 5th wheel trailer, providing a smooth, quiet ride. It also uses a pair of dual-locking jaws to completely wrap the kingpin and ensure a secure vehicle-trailer connection. To make the Q25 even quieter, it comes with three grease fittings and a polyethylene lube plate for optimum lubrication.

Constructed from strong carbon steel and rigorously tested for safety in accordance with SAE J2638, the Q25 5th wheel hitch is the ideal extension for your full-size pickup truck. To ensure good functionality and a long life under the most strenuous towing conditions, this 24K 5th wheel hitch is coated in a carbide black powder coat finish, giving it highly durable protection against rust and wear.

This particular Q25 hitch comes with a set of CURT OEM puck system 5th wheel legs, designed to be mounted on a Ford long-bed pickup with the truck bed puck system. Using a set of quarter-turn anchors, the legs quickly and easily drop into the pucks, instantly mounting the Q25 hitch and equipping the truck for 5th wheel towing. The anchors feature an adjustable design to perfectly lock the hitch into place and eliminate any chucking noises, and the legs are finished in a durable carbide black powder coat to be highly resistant to scratches, rust and UV damage. These legs are only intended to fit the Ford puck system and cannot be installed without it.

Certain turret-style pin boxes, such as Sidewinder, are not compatible with CURT Q-seri

node.sales_desc: Stand out from the Competition with the all new HDX Bandit Rear Bumper from Westin. Built to compliment the style, precision, and durability of the matching HDX Bandit Front Bumper, this all new off-road style rear bumper, is clearly a cut above. Unlike the competition, which features an overlapping two-piece design and an ugly weld which can warp the metal and is prone to rust, the new HDX Bandit Rear Bumper features an extremely clean, one-piece design. The stamped diamond plate step surface is constructed of 11-gauge plate steel and features a welded inner structure for maximum strength. A unique corner step design provides extra wide step area to allow easy access to bed and cargo area. HDX Bandit Rear Bumper includes hardware, mounting brackets, flush mount LED license plate lights and two standard LED back up lights. Fully compatible with blind spot monitors and parking sensors, and can also accommodate an OEM hitch. HDX Bandit Rear is designed for heavy duty performance and extended life that is backed by a 3 year warranty with a black powder coat finish. The new HDX Bandit Rear Bumper is truly in a class by itself.

node.sales_desc: High and Tight" best describes the great looking new Pro-Series Rear Bumpers from Westin. This all new off road style rear bumper features a light weight, slim, one-piece design, adding a modern, aggressive look to your truck. Built to improve ground clearance and departure angles when driving in more rugged terrain. The Pro-Series Rear Bumper is fully compatible for OEM parking sensors, hitch, and blind spot monitors. It also includes two LED license plate lights and can accommodate LED back up lights (sold separately). Featuring a textured black finish with an e-coated base coat, providing long lasting corrosion protection from the elements with easy bolt-on installation. Just add the original Pro-Mod Front Bumper, and your transformation from stock to custom is complete."

node.long_desc: Fits most cars, SUVs, minivans and trucks;Easy to clean with a wipe cloth also machine washable;Water-resistant fabric;Includes four pockets two mesh pockets with an elastic top and two reinforced water-resistant pockets;Durable polycotton twill fabric;Made in the U.S.A.
node.sales_desc:
Keeping your vehicle's seat backs clean can be just as challenging as keeping your floor spotless. Spare yourself the frustration by protecting your vehicle from those messy backseat kickboxers with the durable water-repellent and stain-resistant WeatherTech Seat Back Protector.

Made from a strong polycotton twill fabric, the protector is the ideal first line of defense against ingrained dirt, mud, snow, spills, scuff marks and whatever else the kiddos can get their feet into. For added storage, each protector includes four pockets two mesh pockets with an elastic top and two reinforced water-resistant pockets great for packing away snacks, toys, or games.

The Seat Back Protectors' full coverage design features contoured corners and reinforcement panels, which help to precisely cover and protect your entire seat without bulging. When securing the protector, its easy-to-use adjustable straps and quick release clips allow for effortless install and removal.

Adding to its premium protection features, when it comes time to cleaning the protector, simply wipe a damp cloth and rub away. For more extensive cleaning, using a washing machine will not damage the product.

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 43000 Series Oval California OBDII Compliant Universal Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"

Each durable tank is constructed of 14 gauge steel that is hand welded for strength and reliability; capacity ranges from 30 to 190 gallons; and configurations of rectangular, vertical or L-shaped to meet most truck applications. Each tank has a lockable vent cap to help prevent accidental contamination and baffles to reinforce tank walls, while reducing fluid movement during transit. Rectangular tanks are designed for full-size trucks, while L-shaped tanks are designed to be used with full-size, cross bed and saddle boxes. Available in black or white electro-statically applied powder coated finishes for years of durability. Backed by Lund?s Limited Lifetime Warranty.

node.sales_desc: The Summit Ridge running boards, the most rugged, yet lightweight, OE-styled running boards on the market, add immediate style and a look of distinction to your truck. Now you can transform your vehicle into the way you wanted it to look from the show room floor. LUND's signature running boards are designed to contour to the lines of your truck, sitting high and tight for a seamless appearance, giving you a factory look at a fraction of the cost.

node.long_desc: Available in two and four-piece sets;Available in two paintable finishes: smooth black and textured black;UV-resistant to protect against fading;Tough and durable Tri-Flex ABS thermoplastic;100% stainless steel hardware available in polished and black finishes;Easy no drill installation utilizing factory attachment locations;Limited Lifetime Warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: LUND's RX-Rivet Style fender flares are the perfect addition to lifted trucks, creating a bold, unmistakable appearance. Designed for larger tires and wheels, LUND's RX-Rivet Style flares will transform your Chevy Silverado, Toyota Tundra, GMC Sierra, Dodge Ram or Ford truck into an off-road, gutsy-appearing ride. Update your vehicle with an awesome, wide-body look while shielding it from road debris. The extra height of the flares is also a great quick fix for covering rust and minor damages on the fender.

node.long_desc: Black powder coat;Constructed of 3mm thick-walled mild steel;Fully welded and integrated bracket system;No drilling required;Rock Rail steps sold seperately;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Finally, a patent pending rock guard solution that looks as great on the road as it does off the road! LUND's exclusive Rock Rail is a modular system that offers Jeep owners a step rail (Sold separately ##LII26410020) that can quickly be removed, leaving the rock rail base to protect the Jeep body when hitting the trails. The revolutionary modular Rock Rail system is constructed of fully welded 3mm thick mild steel with a black wrinkle powder coat for years of rugged and durable service. Protecting your Jeep body from on road and off road rocks and debris, the Rock Rail system delivers unique style with premium performance. LUND's Rock Rail system is more than tough enough to protect your Jeep from most off-road terrain. Give your wild side an excuse to run free, while your sensible side maintains a great looking set of step rails for daily use. As with all LUND products, the LUND Rock Rail System is backed by a Limited Lifetime Warranty. Steps are sold separately, see part number LII26410020.
